lenya:publication.lenya:name: Apache Lenya Project (Overview and Documentation)
lenya:publication.lenya:description: This publication implements a documentation site based around Apache Forrest.

lenya:readme.p: The "Editor's View (Authoring)" is still in an experimental version. Please use the "Reader's View (Live)".
The original Forrest sources can be found in Forrest CVS. From the shell this translates to cvs -d :pserver:anoncvs@cvs.apache.org:/home/cvspublic co xml-forrest.
